welcome.TITLE:
Full Stack

Web Developer
welcome.DESCRIPTION:
Solid background and advanced knowledge in web development. For over 17 years, Daniel has been designing, developing and managing projects in IT.

Achieved goals: Developing and consulting for companies like: Dell, Intel, Manpower Inc, Huawei, World Trade Center, Exxon Mobil, Blackberry, and many others.

about_me.TITLE: About me
about_me.DESCRIPTION:
Daniel has been coding since age 11 and pursued his interest in technology by earning a degree in telecommunications. Daniel is passionate about creating value for people using his diverse and deep skills in software development - helping people do things cheaper, better and faster.

Expert in JavaScript and contributor of the open source community. Also knows a few things like:

open_source.TITLE: Open Source
open_source.DESCRIPTION:
Currently an open source enthusiast and dedicate he's free time to open source projects.

Daniel is the creator and maintainer of "node-express-mongodb-jwt-rest-api-skeleton" and "vue-skeleton-mvp" both with thousands of downloads.

These projects are a "Free starter web app combo":
API + Frontend

node-express-mongodb-jwt-rest-api-skeleton
GitHub Repository / Live Demo
vue-skeleton-mvp
GitHub Repository / Live Demo
